import {useEffect, useContext} from 'react' import GithubContext from '../context/github/GithubContext' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import Spinner from '../components/layout/Spinner' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {FaCodepen, FaStore, FaUserFriends, FaUsers} from 'react-icons/fa' function User() { const {getUser, user, loading} = useContext(GithubContext) const params = useParams() useEffect(() => { getUser(params.login) }, []) if (loading) { return } return (
Back To Search
) } export default User
